redeem.heading: 兑换礼券 Redeem Gift Certificate
redeem.intro: 完成以下步骤兑换礼卡 To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: 请在礼卡上找出礼卡号 You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: 把商品放进购物车 Browse the store and add items to your cart as you normally would.
redeem.item3: 点击这里 Click the 'View Cart' link to view the contents of your shopping cart.
redeem.item4: 输入礼卡卷上的礼卡号 Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

balance.heading: 查看礼卡卷余额 Check Gift Certificate Balance
balance.intro: 你可以输入礼卡号码查询卡上的余额 You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

rss.intro: RSS feeds are used for syndicating regularly changing content on a web site, including this one. You can open an RSS feed using an RSS reader and use it to see if there is any new content on this site or you can set up a server-side script to parse the feed and display it on your web site.
